parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: Additional attribute values to include in the response (`labels`, `optimized` status, `computeEnv`). Returns an empty value (`labels: null`, etc.) if omitted.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Maximum number of pipelines to return per request.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of results to skip for pagination. Default: `0`.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Free-text search filter to match against pipeline names and descriptions.

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description: Filter pipelines by visibility. Accepts `private`, `shared`, or `all`.
